nodes.text: Boba Fett: Bounty on Bar-Kooda is a comic written by John Wagner and illustrated by Cam Kennedy.
He is the one man who delivered Han Solo to both Darth Vader and Jabba the Hutt. Across the galaxy, the most-wanted criminals shudder at the mere mention of his name… Boba Fett!

Following the events of Star Wars: Dark Empire II, a Hutt's misguided affections lead to a death contract on a faraway planet. Hired by the Hutt, Boba Fett pursues an intergalactic magician who may hold the key to the Hutt's future. The fact that the magician has died only poses a slight problem for the bounty hunter, as not even the dead can escape from Boba Fett!
Despite the publisher's summary indicating that this story takes place after the events of Star Wars: Dark Empire II, The New Essential Guide to Characters says that the events take place before it.
